publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4857 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees the following revision to the programme of business for Thursday 28 September 2006— after, followed by Stage 1 Debate: St Andrew’s Day Bank Holiday (Scotland) Bill insert, followed by Financial Resolution: Legal Profession and Legal Aid (Scotland) Bill followed by Standards and Public Appointment Committee Motion on Breach of the Code of Conduct for Members of the Scottish Parliament Supported by: George Lyon*
